---
title: "scratch wrok"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

A = matrix(c(0.00, 0.10, 0.41, 0.55, 0.35, 0.10, 1.00, 0.64, 0.47, 0.98, 0.41, 0.64, 1.00, 0.44, 0.85, 0.55, 0.47, 0.44, 1.00, 0.76, 0.35, 0.98, 0.85, 0.76, 1.00), nrow=5, ncol=5, byrow = TRUE) 

D = 1 - A 

D <- dist(D[], diag=TRUE)

hcsingle <- hclust(D,method='single')
plot(hcsingle, xlab="point", ylab="Distance", ylim=c(0,1), main="Single linkage: min distance")


hccomplete <- hclust(D, method='complete')
plot(hccomplete, xlab="point", ylab="Distance", ylim=c(0,1), main="Complete linkage: max distance")
```


```{r}
hcsingle = hclust(D,linkage=:single)

pltsingle = plot(hcsingle,xlabel="point", ylabel="Distance", yaxis=[0.0,1.0],title="Single link")
hccomplete = hclust(D,linkage=:complete)
pltcomplete = plot(hccomplete,xlabel="point",ylabel="Distance", yaxis=[0.0,1.5],title="Complete link")
plot(pltsingle,pltsomplete)
```
